titles: Medicinal experiments, or, A collection of choice and safe remedies, for the most part simple and easily prepared very useful in families and fitted for the service of country people : the third and last volume, published from the author's original manuscripts : whereunto is added several other useful notes explicatory of the same / by ... R. Boyle ...
author: Boyle, Robert, 1627-1691.
publisher: Printed for Samuel Smith and B. Walford ...,
